name: Wordy
summary: A windows program to assist with learning new words.
short_description:
Wordy is a small windows application that assists the user in learning new English words, which can be useful to someone learning English as a second language, or anyone wishing to expand his or her vocabulary.
After adding a list of new words, Wordy finds their definitions on Wordnik as well as helpful visuals on Flickr.
The user then studies these definitions on a regular basis until the words are memorized.
